extendedInfo.description: Buy and sell real estate to beat your friends to the goal.  Upgrade your properties to get more rent, but don't let your spending get away from you.Currently in public beta.  If you have any issues or suggestions please let me know @ chadscreativecreations@gmail.com and it may make it into the final version.Features:Custom amounts for winning, starting, and property prices along with rent income and roll income (most available via the options menu).Properties give you rent for each roll, not just when a player lands on them.Land on a player owned space and you pay rent, but then you have the option to attempt a take over by buying them out.  Just be careful as the player will get a chance to outbid you and end your turn (and the price of the property is included in the owner's bid).Your roll will give you some cash to spend as well as move you around the board, and a random event may happen.Planned Features:Saved games, for those long games you can't finish in one sitting.Online playOnline leader boardAI to play single player against.Themes for the board, player, icons, and soundsAdditional graphicsTags/Keywords: real estate monopoly board game kids free

reviews.title: Good board game
reviews.comment: It\'s a lot like a board game, but no setup.  Kids love it, and I like that it verbally tells us when the turn changes so the kids don\'t play each other\'s turn.  Needs online play or at least some way to save games between play.
reviews.author: Kari W

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: I like the concept but back to the drawing board... A.I option, money is too easy to come across, you can win in a couple turns, the maths is all wrong...  I had 80k and couldn\'t buy an upgrade for 1k???? Didn\'t work properly on HTC one sv.
reviews.author: Claudio Alves

reviews.title: :(  very poor
reviews.comment: This is rubbish don\'t see any point to it at all
reviews.author: Rachael Sparks

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Dont download ! Nothing like monoply And it doesnt open up on my phone properly (samsung galexy ace) Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Xavier Keamy-Browne
